section.title: Accessing and Using a Timeline
section.para:
You can use timelines to view the history record for virtual machines.
Note
Amazon does not provide events, so CloudForms Management Engine does not support timelines for virtual machines hosted by Amazon.

procedure.title: To Access and Use a Timeline

step.para: From the accordion on the left, click a category of Timeline.

listitem.para: Select Configuration Management to see when items were brought under management.
Select Events to view timelines related to operations and changes in configuration.

step.para: Drag the relevant time band, such as hour, day, or month to go to the time you want to see. Note that some timelines, such as Events Operations: All Events, use minutes, hours, and days instead going back only 30 days.
To see more detail for a resource in the timeline, click on it. A balloon appears with a clickable link to the resource.
